data.comment: The match has started at Arena da Baixada.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Fluminense.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 15, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Daniel Nobre Bins.
Marcio Azevedo (Paranaense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 17, In Curitiba, Vinicius Mingotti of Paranaense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Curitiba.
Throw-in Fluminense.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Daniel Nobre Bins.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Arena da Baixada.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 29, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Vitinho of Paranaense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Ganso (Fluminense) has received a yellow card from Daniel Nobre Bins.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Muriel, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fluminenseâ€™s Muriel is on his feet again at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 35, Fluminense make their first substitution with Wellington Silva replacing Luiz Henrique.
Michel Araujo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fluminense.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fluminense drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 40, Daniel Nobre Bins awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick Paranaense.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in Fluminense.
In the minute 45, Paranaense's Richard gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards Fluminense a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 7 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Paranaense drives forward and Richard gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Paranaense's area.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
In the minute 45, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Paranaense.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Michel Araujo returns to the field for Fluminense after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a Fluminense throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 45, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Curitiba.
It's now 0-1 thanks to an own goal from Felipe Aguilar.
The match at Arena da Baixada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Michel Araujo, who is down injured.
In the minute 45, Leo Cittadini for Paranaense has been booked by Daniel Nobre Bins and receives a first yellow card.
Daniel Nobre Bins has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Paranaense push forward at Arena da Baixada and Vitinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fluminense defence.
Pedrinho is on a sub for Marquinhos Gabriel for Paranaense.
In Curitiba, Paranaense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 47, Daniel Nobre Bins awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 49, Fluminense are caught offside.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a Paranaense throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Marcos Paulo for Fluminense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 51, At Arena da Baixada, Wellington Silva has been yellow-carded for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Daniel Nobre Bins.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Fluminense.
In Curitiba Paranaense attack through Vitinho. The finish is off target, however.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Free kick Fluminense.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 58, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Digao is booked for the away team.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Vinicius Mingotti's header is off-target for Paranaense.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 61, Michel Araujo (Fluminense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 63, Walter is replacing Vinicius Mingotti for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Abner Vinicius is replacing Marcio Azevedo for the home team.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 65, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Fluminense pushes forward through Ganso, whose finish on goal is saved.
Walter for Paranaense drives towards goal at Arena da Baixada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 70, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
The away team replace Marcos Paulo with Caio Paulista.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 73, Dodi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Fluminense's Dodi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 76, Wellington (Paranaense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Daniel Nobre Bins awards the home team a throw-in.
Dorival Silvestre Junior is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena da Baixada with Lucho Gonzalez replacing Richard.
In the minute 78, Daniel Nobre Bins signals a Paranaense throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Paranaense's area.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Paranaense.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a third substitution, with Yago Felipe replacing Yuri Lima.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 82, Paranaense's Felipe Aguilar has been booked in Curitiba.
In the minute 84, Fluminense's Ganso misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Daniel Nobre Bins.
Paranaense push forward at Arena da Baixada and Felipe Aguilar gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Fluminense defence.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Khellven with Geuvanio. This is the fifth substitution made today by Dorival Silvestre Junior.
In the minute 87, In Curitiba Paranaense drive forward through Geuvanio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Muriel for Fluminense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 89, Muriel is back on his feet again.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Geuvanio (Paranaense) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniel Nobre Bins signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Pedro Henrique for Paranaense has been booked by Daniel Nobre Bins and receives a first yellow card.
